metadata.title: CVE-2023-0667 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted MSMMS packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, in an unusual configuration, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the context of the process running Wireshark

criterions.comment: wireshark package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
